Class TransactionManager

java.lang.Object
TransactionManager
public class TransactionManager extends Object
Command line UI that executes user's desired actions.
Author:
Michael Muzafarov

    • validCommand

      public static boolean validCommand(String commandType)
      Checks if the given user command is one of the allowed ones
      Parameters:
      commandType - string containing the user's command
      Returns:
      true if it is a valid command, false otherwise

      Will let user know that not enough data was supplied for their chosen command
      Parameters:
      reason - what the user was trying to do

    • checkLengthAndPrintError

      private static boolean checkLengthAndPrintError(String[] tokens)
      Prints error if number of tokens do not match desired command
      Parameters:
      tokens - array of space delimited user inputs
      Returns:
      true if there was an error, or false otherwise

    • parseMoneyAmount

      private static Double parseMoneyAmount(String moneyAmountString)
      Parses a string containing a double with at most 2 decimal places
      Parameters:
      moneyAmountString - the string containing the alleged double
      Returns:
      the Double object or null if it was invalid

    • parseLoyalty

      private static Boolean parseLoyalty(String loyaltyToken)
      Looks for customer loyalty in provided string
      Parameters:
      loyaltyToken - string that is supposed to contain the loyalty passed by user
      Returns:
      Boolean with true if customer is loyal, false if they are not, and null if unable to parse it

    • openProperAccount

      private static Account openProperAccount(String accountTypeString, Profile profileHolder, double balance, String additionalInfoString)
      Opens the proper child class of Account according to given parameters
      Parameters:
      accountTypeString - string which contains the user's specification of account type
      profileHolder - The profile of the user
      balance - the starting balance of the account
      additionalInfoString - contains an int either specifying the customer's loyalty, their campus, or null if the info was not provided
      Returns:
      the created Account or null if the user's input was invalid

    • aggregateAndCreateAccount

      private static Account aggregateAndCreateAccount(String[] tokens)
      Checks user input and attempts to create an Account from the data provided
      Parameters:
      tokens - tokens the words the user entered delimited by spaces
      Returns:
      the account created from user's data or null if there was an issue

    • runMethodIfDatabaseNotEmpty

      private void runMethodIfDatabaseNotEmpty(Runnable method, String listMessage)
      Will run the supplied method if the database is not empty, otherwise will print that the database is empty
      Parameters:
      method - method to execute if database is not empty

    • hasBadWithdrawOrDepositArgument

      private static boolean hasBadWithdrawOrDepositArgument(double amount, String nameOfAction)
      Checks if the amount given is not zero or negative
      Parameters:
      amount - amount to check
      nameOfAction - used to print the error message to user to inform them of what they tried to do
      Returns:
      true if the amount was less than or equal to zero, and false otherwise. If true is returned, the error was already printed.

    • handlePrintCommands

      public boolean handlePrintCommands(String commandType)
      Handles any commands that need to be printed out to console
      Parameters:
      commandType - The String consisting containing the user's desired command
      Returns:
      true if the caller method should keep running because the command was not a print command. False if the caller method should not keep running because the command was handled

    • handleOpenCommand

      private void handleOpenCommand(Account account, String optionalLoyaltyInfo)
      Handle a user's request to open an account
      Parameters:
      optionalLoyaltyInfo - String containing the user specified loyalty for opening a savings account, null if they did not supply this
      account - account to open

    • handleCloseCommand

      private void handleCloseCommand(Account account)
      Close an account
      Parameters:
      account - account to close

    • handleDepositCommand

      private String handleDepositCommand(Account account, double amount)
      Handle a deposit
      Parameters:
      account - account to deposit to
      amount - amount to deposit
      Returns:
      "Deposit" if successful, null otherwise

    • handleWithdrawCommand

      private String handleWithdrawCommand(Account account, double amount)
      Handle a withdrawal
      Parameters:
      account - account to withdraw from
      amount - amount to withdraw
      Returns:
      "Withdraw" if successful, null otherwise

    • handleAccountCommands

      private void handleAccountCommands(String commandType, Account account, String optionalLoyaltyInfo)
      Take care of user commands that require them to input an account
      Parameters:
      commandType - String representing the user's command
      account - the account that the user entered
      optionalLoyaltyInfo - String containing the user specified loyalty for opening a savings account, null if they did not supply this

    • handleCommands

      private void handleCommands(String[] tokens)
      Handles the user's commands
      Parameters:
      tokens - the words the user entered delimited by spaces

      public void run()
      Run the CLI and respond to user commands
